events.name: Caltex Fuel Your School Tech Jam 2018
events.description:
It's time to Jam with technology. Tech Jam aims to introduce school children and families to robots through a combination of online and facilitated learning, presenting a great opportunity to learn about robotics and e-waste.



Suitable for children 8 to 14. Children under 12 need to be accompanied by parents




Families and friends will work in groups to use a blended learning approach to take apart e-waste, extract usable parts and transform it into a robot.





The robot will be controlled by the BBC microbit.





Students will also design an app to control the robot.





Microcontrollers


BBC Microbit


Tablet with Andee app


Assorted craft materials


Access to consumables and shared tools





Challenges


“Wake-up”: enables an individual to wake up another remotely


“Sweeper”: tasked to sweep the floor


“Feed me”: enables plants to let you know when they require water


Open category: Exercise your creativity by making your own fit-for-purpose robot using e-waste





Attendees will get exclusive access to our post visit e-learning modules



Participants are encouoraged to bring their own E-waste. Items that can be taken apart include - battery operated toys, alarm clocks, speakers etc

Due to safety reasons, large e-waste items such as household appliances or any item running off a power socket-will not be accepted. 



The workshop is complimentary to ticket holders of Science Centre Singapore
events.location: Science Centre Singapore, Annexe Hall 2, Singapore 609081

events.name: World Cup Fiesta 2018
events.description:
Join us to watch and celebrate the joy of World Cup 2018!
Please indicate your interest for the matches:
Brazil VS Costa Rica (Jun 22, 8pm)England VS Panama (Jun 24, 8pm)Denmark VS France (Jun 26, 10pm)South Korea VS Germany (Jun 27, 10pm)Semi-Final (Jul 11, 2am)Semi-Final (Jul 12, 2am)Final (Jul 15, 11pm)
Refreshments will be provided!
events.location: 9 N Buona Vista Dr, The Metropolis Tower 1, #18-01/06, Singapore 138588
